settings.heading: What is Modern Artz?
settings.row_content: Â Modern Artz is an online platform showcasing custom artwork created by Kenny Konglomerate. We specialize in curating custom artwork for customers all around the globe in attempts to bridge the gap between hip hop and modern art.

settings.heading: How can I purchaseartwork from your website?
settings.row_content: To purchase artwork, simply visit the Art Gallery section of our website. Browse through our collections, select the artwork you love, select a material and size. Then, click the add to cart button and follow the checkout process

settings.heading: Do you offer custom art commissions?
settings.row_content: Yes, we do offer custom art commissions. Please visit our Custom page to learn more about the process and how to request a custom piece of artwork.

settings.heading: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.row_content: We currently accept payments via credit/debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay and other payment methods. All payments are processed securely through our website.

settings.heading: What is your shipping policy?
settings.row_content: Our shipping policies may vary depending on if the product purchased is custom or from our art gallery. Shipping time is estimated but not guaranteed. At this time custom artwork and items from our art gallery are expected to arrive within 7-15 business days. Holidays and surplus of orders may have an effect on shipping time.

settings.heading: Can I return or exchange artwork if I'm not satisfied?
settings.row_content: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase however at this time all sales are final for custom artwork and items from the art gallery.

settings.heading: How can I contact customer support?
settings.row_content: If you have any questions, concerns, or need assistance, please visit our abotu us page for various ways to get in touch with our customer support team. We are here to help!

settings.heading: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.row_content: Yes, we offer international shipping to customers around the world. Shipping time may vary upon country. Please view your order at Checkout to see more information on Currency Exchange and Shipping Rates.

settings.heading: Are the artworks on your website limited editions?
How can I stay updated on new artwork releases and promotions?
settings.row_content: To stay informed about our latest artwork releases, promotions, and news, we encourage you to subscribe to our newsletter. You can do this by entering your email address in the Subscribe section at the bottom of our website's pages.

settings.title: Our Story
settings.content:
Kenny Kenglomerate is a Digital Creator and entrepreneur residing in the heart of Queens. With a background in Visual Arts
and a keen eye to formulate concepts that will stimulate the viewer and keep them captivated.

The artist known as Kenglomerate is breaking new ground with his eccentric style and taking photo manipulation to the next level. Developing this style and skill of artistic precision, so early in his
career allowed him to coin a phrase "Mindtography" as a technique used to create his pieces. A mindtographer can be described as a photo illusionist that creates aesthetic forms of art in a digital format; creating unbelievable visuals that merge between worlds of fantasy and reality.
